I make a room called 'RoomName' with all the other fields containing text.  When I save the game strait away (Without anything else changed from the moment i launched QDK), it tells me I already have a room named RoomName.

I change the room to 'RoomName sdfsdf', and when I try to save the game again, it crashes.

It also didn't save any of the other fields.

But when I loaded up QDK again, and loaded the ASL file, re-entered the data, and it worked.

Prefix
